attributes.action: Engage UN to oversee the British EU Referendum to prevent vote counting fraud.
attributes.additional_details:
General Election 2015: 200,000 ballot papers stolen by van thieves

Officers investigating the theft said they found nothing to suggest the van was targeted for its contents 

http://www.independent.co.uk/news/uk/politics/generalelection/general-election-2015-200000-ballot-papers-stolen-by-van-thieves-10213657.html


BOOM! PROOF 'SCOTLAND INDEPENDENCE VOTE' WAS RIGGED!
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=kUR-HgAtwtg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=LbJif7vISQg

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3oRg-VKuE68
attributes.background: There has been great speculation that both the Scottish and last General Election was fixed by the government.  Claimed offenses range from fraudulent ballot papers being filled in and being deliberately put on the wrong voting piles by staff and a van load of 200,000 voting papers going missing.
